name: BeautyMotive
tag_list: youtube, beauty, video, cosmetics, integrated-advertising, word-of-mouth-marketing, social-video
overview:
We are creating the first enthusiast driven ad-network where brands pay niche vloggers to use & review their products in YouTube videos.

Our platform matches brands to particular vloggers based on their audience demographic. Those vloggers then use the brandâ€™s product in YouTube videos alongside a unique link that allows viewers to buy it. Brands pay us & we pay vloggers per thousand views. We are starting in the beauty niche where tens of thousands of women create makeup tutorial videos that are viewed 364 million times a month!
